code: import'./EditPopup.css';import{motion,useAnimate}from"framer-motion";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EditPopup=_ref=>{let{active,setActive,children,updateFunction,fieldToUpdate,newValue,idUser,setReloadPage}=_ref;const[scope,animate]=useAnimate();const cancel=async()=>{await animate(scope.current,{scale:0});setActive(false);};const save=async()=>{await updateFunction(fieldToUpdate,newValue,idUser);await animate(scope.current,{scale:0});setActive(false);setReloadPage(true);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{ref:scope,className:"edit-popup-wrapper",initial:{scale:0},animate:active?{scale:1}:null,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"edit-popup",children:[children,/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"edit-popup-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"cancel-button",onClick:()=>cancel(),children:"\u041E\u0442\u043C\u0435\u043D\u0438\u0442\u044C \u0438\u0437\u043C\u0435\u043D\u0435\u043D\u0438\u044F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"save-button",onClick:()=>save(),children:"\u0421\u043E\u0445\u0440\u0430\u043D\u0438\u0442\u044C"})]})]})});};export default EditPopup;
